  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Block, OtherAttributesAware, NamedNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WhenSkipSendToEndpointDefinition

    @Metadata(label="eip,routing")
public class WhenDefinition
extends ExpressionNode
    Triggers a route when an expression evaluates to true

      • endParent

        public ProcessorDefinition<?> endParent()
        Description copied from class: ProcessorDefinition
        Strategy to allow ProcessorDefinitions to have special logic when using end() in the DSL to return back to the intended parent.

        For example a content based router we return back to the ChoiceDefinition when we end() from a WhenDefinition.

        Overrides:
        endParent in class ProcessorDefinition<ExpressionNode>
        Returns:
        the end
